statements: DELETE FROM performance_reports WHERE shipment_id = 500 AND report_date = '2022-01-10';
DELETE FROM performance_reports WHERE report_id = 100 AND shipment_id = 200;
DELETE FROM performance_reports WHERE delay_reason = 'Weather conditions' AND transit_time > 10;
DELETE FROM shipments WHERE shipment_id = 10 AND shipment_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM performance_reports WHERE report_date >= '2021-06-01' AND delivery_status = 'Delayed';
DELETE FROM shipments WHERE shipment_id = 101 AND destination_city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_id = 500 AND available_quantity < 10;
